content.description: This is probably the most popular boulder in the canyon. It is a good warm up spot because it is on the way to most of the other boulders in the canyon. Though this problem has been said to be hard for the grade it is simply the slopers that make things dicey. Bring plenty of contact strength.
content.location: Sit start on the bottom right aret, and move up for two moves to the pocket, avoid the high up choss. Transition to the slopers along the lip. move left along the lip and top out on the fer left.

content.description: This is the first good boulder that you come upon on the main boulder gardens trail. you approach it from the back which is a big slab that can be used for easy warm ups.
